overview: Matt Hughes stars in this sequel to our recent Postman video and Ross Hurston takes another delivery, only this time it comes in pints. In our very own oral tribute to 70's sex films, amorous milkman Matt Hughes has been servicing the lonely house-husbands all along his route until he meets his match in man-eater Ross... This sword-swallowing stud is the only bloke we've met who can take Hughes' huge cock right down his throat, until Matt's banging his bollocks on Ross's chin, and obviously loving the ride - rewarding Ross with a face full of his own-brand of Channel Island Full Cream Gold Top.
title: The Milkman
